attributes.action: pressure the BBC to bring Terry Wogan back to prime time television
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Sir Terry Wogan is one of the nation's favourite entertainers. Despite having an audience of millions for his BBC Radio 2 breakfast show, Tel is sadly no longer seen on prime time television. Sign this petition to request that the Government lobby the BBC to put him back on our screens where he belongs!

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
